tool.name: Kraken-mpa-report
tool.description: view report of classification for multiple samples

param.label: Display taxa even if they lack a read in any sample
param.name: show_zeros

param.label: Display a header line indicating sample IDs
param.name: header_line

tool.help:
.. class:: warningmark
**Note**: the database used must be the same as the one used in the original Kraken run
-----
**What is Does**
Kraken-mpa-report summarizes read counts across taxonomic ranks for multiple samples. This is convenient for comparing results across multiple expreriments, conditions, locations, etc. It support sthe following parameters::
--show-zeros Display taxa even if they lack a read in any sample --header-line Display a header line indicating sample IDs (sample IDs are the filenames)
-----
**Output**
The output of kraken-mpa-report is tab-delimited, with one line per taxon.
